column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Miss Kilbride''' (Katherine or Kitty)

column1: *'''Subject:''' Personal greetings. News of the hardships suffered that year and of his family
